pageContext.claim: “Nancy Pelosi doesn't want to approve [another covid relief bill] because she wants to bail out poorly run Democrat states, and we don't wanna do that.”
pageContext.analysis: The biggest states happen to be run by Democrats, so any state bailout would likely mean they would get more money. But Republican states are suffering too. Sen. Mitt Romney (R-Utah) carried a poster into a Senate GOP meeting that said: “Blue states aren’t the only ones who are screwed.” As Slate put it, "Red states are also fiscally screwed thanks to the coronavirus, and in many cases may be in worse shape than supposedly irresponsible blue states."
